body:
This is a sub-set of #9235, including only the `wallet` dir and `util*` files.

Same-binaries check:
```
$ ../bitcoin-maintainer-tools/build-for-compare.py 9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1 df8b24992fcec6a9f9449b30c6f8b4c4e083ae62 --executables "src/bitcoind,src/bitcoin-cli,src/bitcoin-tx"
[...]
make[1]: Ã£ÂÂÃ£ÂÂ£Ã£ÂÂ¬Ã£ÂÂ¯Ã£ÂÂÃ£ÂÂª '/tmp/repo/src' Ã£ÂÂÃ£ÂÂÃ¥ÂÂºÃ£ÂÂ¾Ã£ÂÂ
>>> [do_build] Copying object files...
>>> [do_build] Performing basic analysis pass...
>>> [do_build] Use these commands to compare results:
>>> [do_build] $ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped
>>> [do_build] $ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1 /tmp/compare/df8b24992fcec6a9f9449b30c6f8b4c4e083ae62
$ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped
889f04e6e4a3825378f10a8a3dbbc9545434888cf9b112ff7d09793547f6202a  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-cli.9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1.stripped
889f04e6e4a3825378f10a8a3dbbc9545434888cf9b112ff7d09793547f6202a  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-cli.df8b24992fcec6a9f9449b30c6f8b4c4e083ae62.stripped
3dd896903febf9f5d60924a1fdc13c02373b2b5e1cb7492c0f2ff64abb900efc  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-tx.9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1.stripped
3dd896903febf9f5d60924a1fdc13c02373b2b5e1cb7492c0f2ff64abb900efc  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-tx.df8b24992fcec6a9f9449b30c6f8b4c4e083ae62.stripped
d3466c5d23ccdea45d1a924faabc8cd1c1e180cb3c9c47d08c839b8719b0afb9  /tmp/compare/bitcoind.9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1.stripped
d3466c5d23ccdea45d1a924faabc8cd1c1e180cb3c9c47d08c839b8719b0afb9  /tmp/compare/bitcoind.df8b24992fcec6a9f9449b30c6f8b4c4e083ae62.stripped
$ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1 /tmp/compare/df8b24992fcec6a9f9449b30c6f8b4c4e083ae62
$ 
```

The affected files and namespaces:
```
util.cpp:                 std
utilmoneystr.cpp:         std
utilstrencodings.cpp:     std
utiltime.cpp:             std [unused]
wallet/db.cpp:            std
wallet/rpcdump.cpp:       std
wallet/rpcwallet.cpp:     std
wallet/test/wallet_tests.cpp: std
wallet/wallet.cpp:        std
wallet/walletdb.cpp:      std
```
title: [refactor] Remove using namespace <xxx> from wallet/ & util*
